title: Ticket #3825: Finish 2 new shadow tests
description:
The two tests shadow_mem_usage-basic.run and shadow_s_mem_usage-basic.run pull memory usage from regular shadow and static shadow.

The next phase is having a hash which can be accessed by nmi_platform and if the memory is more then 5% higher then when we gathered the data, the test will fail.

The current test only works for Linux

Solaris and Darwin and windows do it differently and yield false positives and so it is switched to only Linux in CMakeList.txt
